statements: UPDATE fish_inventory SET quantity = 10, cost = 15.99 WHERE fish_id = 1;
UPDATE fish_inventory SET cost = 12.50, quantity = 20 WHERE fish_name = 'Salmon';
UPDATE fish_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10, cost = cost * 1.1 WHERE fish_id = 1;
UPDATE fish_inventory SET cost = 25.50, quantity = 50 WHERE fish_name = 'Salmon';
UPDATE FishFeed SET name='Premium Fish Food', quantity=100 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Equipment SET condition='Good', quantity=20, name='Aquarium Filter' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE FishFeed SET quantity = 100, expiration_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Equipment SET condition = 'Good', quantity = 50 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE fish_feed_inventory SET quantity = 50 WHERE name = 'Fish Food';
UPDATE equipment_inventory SET status = 'IN USE', quantity = 20 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE fish_feed_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE name = 'Fish Flakes';
UPDATE medication_inventory SET expiration_date = '2023-12-31', quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE name = 'Antibiotic X';
UPDATE fish_feed_inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE medication_inventory SET expiration_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE name = 'Vitamin C';
UPDATE fish_feed_inventory SET quantity = 50, expiration_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE equipment_inventory SET name = 'Pump' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE fish_feed SET quantity = 20 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE medication SET dosage = 2.5 WHERE id = 3 AND name = 'Antibiotic';
UPDATE fish_feed SET quantity = 50, expiry_date = '2023-06-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE equipment SET condition = 'Good', quantity = 10 WHERE name = 'Filter Pump';
